description:
os: add missing byte to FileMode buffer

32 bytes is enough for all FileMode bits.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

The only thing left is that the CL description is inaccurate now. 
After the first line, say

Need 32 bits for all FileMode bits.

or something equivalent

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

http://codereview.appspot.com/5853044/diff/3001/src/pkg/os/types.go
File src/pkg/os/types.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5853044/diff/3001/src/pkg/os/types.go#newcode61
src/pkg/os/types.go:61: const rwx = "rwxrwxrwx"
since m is a uint32, why not just do
var buf [32]byte // Mode is uint32.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5853044/diff/4003/src/pkg/os/types.go
File src/pkg/os/types.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5853044/diff/4003/src/pkg/os/types.go#newcode61
src/pkg/os/types.go:61: var buf [32]byte
Please include the comment I mentioned in my previous mail.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=59f7059d66e9 ***

os: add missing byte to FileMode buffer

32 bytes is enough for all FileMode bits.

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5853044

Committer: Rob Pike <r@golang.org>

subject: code review 5853044: os: add missing byte to FileMode buffer
